consumer¶

Identity v3

Requires: OS-OAUTH1 extension

consumer create¶

Create new consumer

os consumer create
    [--description <description>]
--description <description>¶

New consumer description

consumer delete¶

Delete consumer

os consumer delete
    <consumer>
<consumer>

Consumer to delete

consumer list¶

List consumers

os consumer list

consumer set¶

Set consumer properties

os consumer set
    [--description <description>]
    <consumer>
--description <description>¶

New consumer description

<consumer>

Consumer to modify

consumer show¶

Display consumer details

os consumer show

<consumer>
